# Chip API

<p className="description">The API documentation of the Chip React component. Learn more about the props and the CSS customization points.</p>

## Import

```js
import Chip from '@material-ui/core/Chip';
// or
import { Chip } from '@material-ui/core';
```

You can learn more about the difference by [reading this guide](/guides/minimizing-bundle-size/).

Chips represent complex entities in small blocks, such as a contact.

## Props

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| <span className="prop-name">avatar</span> | <span className="prop-type">element</span> |  | Avatar element. |
| <span className="prop-name">children</span> | <span className="prop-type">unsupportedProp</span> |  | This prop isn't supported. Use the `component` prop if you need to change the children structure. |
| <span className="prop-name">classes</span> | <span className="prop-type">object</span> |  | Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See [CSS API](#css) below for more details. |
| <span className="prop-name">clickable</span> | <span className="prop-type">bool</span> |  | If true, the chip will appear clickable, and will raise when pressed, even if the onClick prop is not defined. If false, the chip will not be clickable, even if onClick prop is defined. This can be used, for example, along with the component prop to indicate an anchor Chip is clickable. |
| <span className="prop-name">color</span> | <span className="prop-type">'default'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'primary'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'secondary'</span> | <span className="prop-default">'default'</span> | The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component. |
| <span className="prop-name">component</span> | <span className="prop-type">elementType</span> | <span className="prop-default">'div'</span> | The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a DOM element or a component. |
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIcon</span> | <span className="prop-type">element</span> |  | Override the default delete icon element. Shown only if `onDelete` is set. |
| <span className="prop-name">disabled</span> | <span className="prop-type">bool</span> | <span className="prop-default">false</span> | If `true`, the chip should be displayed in a disabled state. |
| <span className="prop-name">icon</span> | <span className="prop-type">element</span> |  | Icon element. |
| <span className="prop-name">label</span> | <span className="prop-type">node</span> |  | The content of the label. |
| <span className="prop-name">onDelete</span> | <span className="prop-type">func</span> |  | Callback function fired when the delete icon is clicked. If set, the delete icon will be shown. |
| <span className="prop-name">size</span> | <span className="prop-type">'small'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'medium'</span> | <span className="prop-default">'medium'</span> | The size of the chip. |
| <span className="prop-name">variant</span> | <span className="prop-type">'default'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'outlined'</span> | <span className="prop-default">'default'</span> | The variant to use. |

The `ref` is forwarded to the root element.

Any other props supplied will be provided to the root element (native element).

## CSS

- Style sheet name: `MuiChip`.
- Style sheet details:

| Rule name | Global class | Description |
|:-----|:-------------|:------------|
| <span className="prop-name">root</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-root</span> | Styles applied to the root element.
| <span className="prop-name">sizeSmall</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-sizeSmall</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
| <span className="prop-name">colorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-colorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">colorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-colorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">disabled</span> | <span className="prop-name">Mui-disabled</span> | Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
| <span className="prop-name">clickable</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-clickable</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onClick` is defined or `clickable={true}`.
| <span className="prop-name">clickableColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-clickableColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onClick` and `color="primary"` is defined or `clickable={true}`.
| <span className="prop-name">clickableColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-clickableColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onClick` and `color="secondary"` is defined or `clickable={true}`.
| <span className="prop-name">deletable</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deletable</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onDelete` is defined.
| <span className="prop-name">deletableColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deletableColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onDelete` and `color="primary"` is defined.
| <span className="prop-name">deletableColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deletableColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `onDelete` and `color="secondary"` is defined.
| <span className="prop-name">outlined</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-outlined</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"`.
| <span className="prop-name">outlinedPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-outlinedPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="primary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">outlinedSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-outlinedSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="secondary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">avatar</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-avatar</span> | Styles applied to the `avatar` element.
| <span className="prop-name">avatarSmall</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-avatarSmall</span> | 
| <span className="prop-name">avatarColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-avatarColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the `avatar` element if `color="primary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">avatarColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-avatarColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the `avatar` element if `color="secondary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">icon</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-icon</span> | Styles applied to the `icon` element.
| <span className="prop-name">iconSmall</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-iconSmall</span> | Styles applied to the `icon` element if `size="small"`.
| <span className="prop-name">iconColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-iconColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the `icon` element if `color="primary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">iconColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-iconColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the `icon` element if `color="secondary"`.
| <span className="prop-name">label</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-label</span> | Styles applied to the label `span` element`.
| <span className="prop-name">labelSmall</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-labelSmall</span> | 
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIcon</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIcon</span> | Styles applied to the `deleteIcon` element.
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIconSmall</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIconSmall</span> | Styles applied to the `deleteIcon` element if `size="small"`.
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIconColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIconColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the deleteIcon element if `color="primary"` and `variant="default"`.
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIconColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIconColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the deleteIcon element if `color="secondary"` and `variant="default"`.
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIconOutlinedColorPrimary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIconOutlinedColorPrimary</span> | Styles applied to the deleteIcon element if `color="primary"` and `variant="outlined"`.
| <span className="prop-name">deleteIconOutlinedColorSecondary</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiChip-deleteIconOutlinedColorSecondary</span> | Styles applied to the deleteIcon element if `color="secondary"` and `variant="outlined"`.

You can override the style of the component thanks to one of these customization points:

- With a rule name of the [`classes` object prop](/customization/components/#overriding-styles-with-classes).
- With a [global class name](/customization/components/#overriding-styles-with-global-class-names).
- With a theme and an [`overrides` property](/customization/globals/#css).

If that's not sufficient, you can check the [implementation of the component](https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/blob/master/packages/material-ui/src/Chip/Chip.js) for more detail.
